alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Boone; Knox; Madison; Pierce; Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 22 at 3:04PM CDT until October 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR A PORTION OF NORTHEAST NEBRASKA... * Affected Area...In Nebraska, Knox, Antelope, Pierce, Boone, Madison and Platte counties. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 22 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in any activities that could start a fire. Outdoor burning is not advisable.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Antelope; Boone; Knox; Madison; Pierce; Platte
